entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:40 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
